topComments.author: David S.

Ent√£o eles cuidam do meio ambiente e protegem a montanha. Eu recomendo ir com o Mount Cameroon Trekking por causa do pacote perfeito e da organiza√ß√£o por tr√°s dele. (Original) We were a group of 4 German guys and did the 3 day tour to the summit and at the backside down. It was all perfect organized and the guide and the porters were excellent. We did the tour with the organization Pro Climate and "Brot f√ºr die Welt". So they take care of the environment and protect the mountain. I highly recommend to go with Mount Cameroon Trekking because of the perfect package and the organization behind it.  We slept in new and comfortable huts. Food and water was provided by the porters. We had one porter per person and one guide.  They also offer a shuttle from Douala Airport to Buea.  We had no safety problems because of the political situation or some people, it was one of the safest attraction what we did in Cameroon.

topComments.author: Dzung Khuc

Tive muita sorte quando consegui entrar em contato com um agente do guia tur√≠stico (Ecotour Guides Cameroon) na esta√ß√£o das chuvas (julho) e meu guia (carregador) - o Sr. Buma Peter estava me dando o melhor apoio durante a viagem de 2 dias.
